SWSC Creates Police Department, Appoints Chief

nav.div: Southwest School Corporation Central Office » Parents » Coronavirus Information

span.span: Southwest School Corporation is committed to the health and safety of our students and staff.
The district follows precautions as recommended by local and state health agencies, and

has a Pandemic and Medical Emergencies Plan in place in the event of a disease outbreak within our schools.
To help prevent the spread of illness within our schools, please follow the Guidelines for School Absence Due to Illness provided by the Indiana Department of Education. Please contact
Southwest School Corporation Nurse Susan Tincher at 812-268-3341, extension 2765 with any questions.

p.span: Please review the following links for up-to-date information.

span.strong: Please click on the following graphics for helpful information:

strong.span: Guidelines for School Absence Due to Illness
How to Prevent the Spread of Germs

span.span: How to Talk to Your Child About Coronavirus
